 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂגָא‎</span>] **verb** ==grow, grow great== (√ only in Job; Aramaism; compare Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְגִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְגָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, all ***increase, grow great***; Old Aramaic, Biblical Aramaic, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שג(י)א‎</span> adjective ***much***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular metaplastic <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂגֶּא‎</span> [[Job.8.11|Job 8:11]] (of plant; metaplastic from [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75oo»§ 75oo</sup>; &gt; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂגֶּה‎</span>). 

**Hiph\`il 1.** ***make great***, participle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׂגִּיא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַגּוֺיִם‎</span> [[Job.12.23|Job 12:23]] ***he maketh the nations great*** (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> **3 b**). 

**2.** ***magnify, laud***, 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּשְׂגִּיא פעלו‎</span> [[Job.36.24|Job 36:24]] ***that thou magnify his work***; — see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂגה‎</span>.
